i think this product is great i brought it for a gift for a little girl whos about to turn 3 and i think its perfect  it all folds down into a little box so it can all be kept together and use for travel although could do with some clips to hold the lid down because it only places on - but its nothing an elastic band or two cant sort out  the board is sturdy when propped up in the box so great for writing and drawing on - you dont need to prop it up though you could rest it on the floor  it has one side marker board and the other side is a chalk board  it comes with a pen a eraser and some 3 coloured chalks to get you started  you get loads of magnets to play with on the board  i love the fact that you can build anything and use any pieces to create pictures you can build your animals as all the bits are separate - so theres nothing stopping you from creating your own animals which i think is great for childrens imaginations   please note that some of these pieces are quite small  so as long as the child doesnt put things in their mouths this toy is perfect i think this toy is quite educational because there are loads of talking points that could be used whilst playing with this and so many different ways that you can use/play with this board  it arrived really quickly and well packaged as well

considering the price ¬£1399 with an 10% voucher at time of this amazon vine review i was expecting that this take apart dinosaur set would arrive in an attractive box or packaging suitable for gifting and it doesinside the cardboard box there are basic set of picture instructions also inside the box there are three colourful take apart dinosaurs in pieces in individual clear non-resealable bags and an electric drill  with two different drill heads batteries required not included and youll need a small tool to open and close the battery compartment each dinosaur pack also has a plastic manual screwdriver which can be used instead of the battery operated drillthe three dinosaurs are a t-rex velociraptor triceratops each colourful dinosaur is put together with the supplied screws which are tightened using the electric drill and one of the drill heads or the plastic screwdriver the idea is that you can put together the dinosaurs play with them and then take them apart to reassemble at a later datei think this is a reasonably good value set as i fairly recently bought a single take apart dinosaur for about ¬£3 no electric drill and these three dinosaurs look as if it is a similar size this is also a nice selection of sturdy looking plastic dinosaurs containing three popular ones and you could split up the set to up to three children i am pleased with this product and i am happy to recommend

seriously who thought up these things the lego dots annoy the life out of me basically because i always find them all over my floor the good thing is that unlike the bricks these arent some sort of medieval torture device if you stand on them my daughter is 7 and she loves all things lego including these shes not big on designing things herself but will happily follow the instructions to produce something resembling whats on the box

this is a wonderful set - the newer lego dot range appeals to the older girl who perhaps likes to decorate/create personalised items i guess the combination of the famous mouse alongside the lego name has inflated the price even higher  than usual however price aside the item itself is lots of fun and keeps her entertained for hours
my grandson and granddaughter are great disney fans so we had a lovely time playing with thisyou get everything you need to make several itemsgreat for disney and lego fans

this is a really great set comes with lots of different pieces to makes lots of different bits and bobs my daughter really likes it everything is good quality and the instructions are easy to follow pricy but worth it

lego - whats not to like  mickey mouse - whats not to likethis set gives you both  it comes with clear instructions for you to make 6 mickey and minnie themed lego items for your desk and tags for your school bagmy granddaughter loved it - she had a lot of fun making the items and they now take pride of place on the table in her bedroomi know its lego and lego is never cheap - but i do think its on the expensive side even for that brand which is why i have only given in 4 stars instead of 5

when you thought lego couldn‚Äôt get even more fabulous and versatile they created lego dotsthese kits are perfect for a young designer who wants to create different patterns or designs on a variety of practical pieces  this set comes with the base pieces to design a 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patchthey are supposedly mickey and minnie themed however i think this is a bit of a stretch as only a few pieces have a theme printed onto them or the pieces are made to look like mickey ears  nevertheless you get plenty of tiny pieces to design and create your pieces which was perfect for my 5 year old daughterlego is always that little bit more expensive but you are paying for good quality long-lasting toys  these can be designed over and over for years and years to come

this lego set was a big hit in our house my stepdaughter loved building it up and its now displayed proudly shes a huge fan of lego dots so the added sentiment of mickey was a huge hit it builds well and allows for creativity would love to see more

a great present for somebody who likes crafts creativity and legomaking something practical to keep a box a pencil holder and customising it what better fungreat family / friends activity add your own lego or dots to other setscute colours and disney pieces

we have lego mad kids in our house and they are just starting to get into the dots this is a lovely little set that contains 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patchlego tends to be top end in terms of price anyway but i felt this set was a little too far on the top end of that market possibly because its mickey mouse tooregardless kids loved it and its a very cute set and makes getting back to school fun now takes pride of place on the desk¬£35 at the time of review

perfect for any mickey fan this was in the same style as many of the dots set but with the mickey theme you can make five different things including bag tags photo frame small two drawer chest you get plenty of dots to do your designs with and of course they interact with any other colours you might have from other sets they are fun and easy to do and you can change them around and my daughter enjoys be able to use the items in her room overall good value and fun

this review is for lego set number 41964 the set features mickey and minnie mouse themed projects and it comes from the lego dots range it currently costs ¬£35  it is aimed at ages 6+ the pieces themselves are very small - dots in fact these dots are used to decorate the craft set which eatures a 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patch this is quite a strange lego concept which i have never come across before i guess that this would be a lovely gift for an artistic lego enthusiast it is designed so as to be able to change the design of the frame / bag tags / etc when the urge comes over the budding designer there are disney specific dots that are mickey and minnie themed they look a bit like emojis the frame template looks like mickey‚Äôs ears and can be decorated with the coloured dots due to the small dots this set is recommended for ages 6 plus

i think this product is great i brought it for a gift for a little girl whos about to turn 3 and i think its perfect  it all folds down into a little box so it can all be kept together and use for travel although could do with some clips to hold the lid down because it only places on - but its nothing an elastic band or two cant sort out  the board is sturdy when propped up in the box so great for writing and drawing on - you dont need to prop it up though you could rest it on the floor  it has one side marker board and the other side is a chalk board  it comes with a pen a eraser and some 3 coloured chalks to get you started  you get loads of magnets to play with on the board  i love the fact that you can build anything and use any pieces to create pictures you can build your animals as all the bits are separate - so theres nothing stopping you from creating your own animals which i think is great for childrens imaginations   please note that some of these pieces are quite small  so as long as the child doesnt put things in their mouths this toy is perfect i think this toy is quite educational because there are loads of talking points that could be used whilst playing with this and so many different ways that you can use/play with this board  it arrived really quickly and well packaged as well

considering the price ¬£1399 with an 10% voucher at time of this amazon vine review i was expecting that this take apart dinosaur set would arrive in an attractive box or packaging suitable for gifting and it doesinside the cardboard box there are basic set of picture instructions also inside the box there are three colourful take apart dinosaurs in pieces in individual clear non-resealable bags and an electric drill  with two different drill heads batteries required not included and youll need a small tool to open and close the battery compartment each dinosaur pack also has a plastic manual screwdriver which can be used instead of the battery operated drillthe three dinosaurs are a t-rex velociraptor triceratops each colourful dinosaur is put together with the supplied screws which are tightened using the electric drill and one of the drill heads or the plastic screwdriver the idea is that you can put together the dinosaurs play with them and then take them apart to reassemble at a later datei think this is a reasonably good value set as i fairly recently bought a single take apart dinosaur for about ¬£3 no electric drill and these three dinosaurs look as if it is a similar size this is also a nice selection of sturdy looking plastic dinosaurs containing three popular ones and you could split up the set to up to three children i am pleased with this product and i am happy to recommend

seriously who thought up these things the lego dots annoy the life out of me basically because i always find them all over my floor the good thing is that unlike the bricks these arent some sort of medieval torture device if you stand on them my daughter is 7 and she loves all things lego including these shes not big on designing things herself but will happily follow the instructions to produce something resembling whats on the box

this is a wonderful set - the newer lego dot range appeals to the older girl who perhaps likes to decorate/create personalised items i guess the combination of the famous mouse alongside the lego name has inflated the price even higher  than usual however price aside the item itself is lots of fun and keeps her entertained for hours
my grandson and granddaughter are great disney fans so we had a lovely time playing with thisyou get everything you need to make several itemsgreat for disney and lego fans

this is a really great set comes with lots of different pieces to makes lots of different bits and bobs my daughter really likes it everything is good quality and the instructions are easy to follow pricy but worth it

lego - whats not to like  mickey mouse - whats not to likethis set gives you both  it comes with clear instructions for you to make 6 mickey and minnie themed lego items for your desk and tags for your school bagmy granddaughter loved it - she had a lot of fun making the items and they now take pride of place on the table in her bedroomi know its lego and lego is never cheap - but i do think its on the expensive side even for that brand which is why i have only given in 4 stars instead of 5

when you thought lego couldn‚Äôt get even more fabulous and versatile they created lego dotsthese kits are perfect for a young designer who wants to create different patterns or designs on a variety of practical pieces  this set comes with the base pieces to design a 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patchthey are supposedly mickey and minnie themed however i think this is a bit of a stretch as only a few pieces have a theme printed onto them or the pieces are made to look like mickey ears  nevertheless you get plenty of tiny pieces to design and create your pieces which was perfect for my 5 year old daughterlego is always that little bit more expensive but you are paying for good quality long-lasting toys  these can be designed over and over for years and years to come

this lego set was a big hit in our house my stepdaughter loved building it up and its now displayed proudly shes a huge fan of lego dots so the added sentiment of mickey was a huge hit it builds well and allows for creativity would love to see more

a great present for somebody who likes crafts creativity and legomaking something practical to keep a box a pencil holder and customising it what better fungreat family / friends activity add your own lego or dots to other setscute colours and disney pieces

we have lego mad kids in our house and they are just starting to get into the dots this is a lovely little set that contains 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patchlego tends to be top end in terms of price anyway but i felt this set was a little too far on the top end of that market possibly because its mickey mouse tooregardless kids loved it and its a very cute set and makes getting back to school fun now takes pride of place on the desk¬£35 at the time of review

perfect for any mickey fan this was in the same style as many of the dots set but with the mickey theme you can make five different things including bag tags photo frame small two drawer chest you get plenty of dots to do your designs with and of course they interact with any other colours you might have from other sets they are fun and easy to do and you can change them around and my daughter enjoys be able to use the items in her room overall good value and fun

this review is for lego set number 41964 the set features mickey and minnie mouse themed projects and it comes from the lego dots range it currently costs ¬£35  it is aimed at ages 6+ the pieces themselves are very small - dots in fact these dots are used to decorate the craft set which eatures a 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patch this is quite a strange lego concept which i have never come across before i guess that this would be a lovely gift for an artistic lego enthusiast it is designed so as to be able to change the design of the frame / bag tags / etc when the urge comes over the budding designer there are disney specific dots that are mickey and minnie themed they look a bit like emojis the frame template looks like mickey‚Äôs ears and can be decorated with the coloured dots due to the small dots this set is recommended for ages 6 plus

da qualche hanno lego ha introdotto nel suo catalogo la serie lego dots un gioco creativo rivolto ai pi√π piccoli che permette di creare alcuni oggetti come braccialetti portapenne cornici ed altro con la possibilit√† di personalizzarli a piacimentoogni confezione di lego dots comprende gli oggetti che servono come base e da elementi i dots realizzati in varie forme e colori e che si applicano a pressione sulle basi non esiste uno schema preciso per applicare i dots alla base quindi il gioco lascia molto spazio alla fantasia dei bambini che personalizzano l‚Äôoggetto sempre in maniera diversaquesto kit back to school di topolino e minnie si compone di 669 pezzi e contiene le basi per realizzare i seguenti oggetti- 1 scrigno con 2 cassetti con le orecchie di topolino- 1 cornice- 1 porta biglietti- 2 tag bag piatte- 1 patch adesivacome detto il set √® poi ricco di dots di forme e colori diversi e se non dovessero bastare √® sempre possibile acquistare gli extra dots lego per aumentare ancor di pi√π le tante combinazioni possibilinel momento in cui scrivo la recensione il costo √® di circa 40 euro grazie ad uno sconto del 10% ma secondo me resta ancora troppo alto per questo tipo di prodotto legoper questo motivo restando i prodotti lego dei giochi sempre graditi ed esclusivi non assegno il punteggio massimo e vi invito ad acquistarlo solo se i vostri bambini amano la serie dots

lego √©volue toujours jai d√©j√† eu loccasion de tester la gamme dots avec mes filles et √† chaque fois elles ont ador√©dans la boite il y a plusieurs activit√©s √† lint√©rieur - un cadre photo original avec les oreilles de mickey- une boite de rangement avec deux tiroirs- deux porte cl√©- un support √† message carr√©- un support adh√©sifspour la d√©coration il faut laisser parler sa cr√©ativit√© de plus on peu en changer quand bon nous semblele tout est sur le th√®me du c√©l√®bre mickey mouse avec de belle couleur un ensemble de qualit√© toutefois un peu cher √† mon gout

i think this product is great i brought it for a gift for a little girl whos about to turn 3 and i think its perfect  it all folds down into a little box so it can all be kept together and use for travel although could do with some clips to hold the lid down because it only places on - but its nothing an elastic band or two cant sort out  the board is sturdy when propped up in the box so great for writing and drawing on - you dont need to prop it up though you could rest it on the floor  it has one side marker board and the other side is a chalk board  it comes with a pen a eraser and some 3 coloured chalks to get you started  you get loads of magnets to play with on the board  i love the fact that you can build anything and use any pieces to create pictures you can build your animals as all the bits are separate - so theres nothing stopping you from creating your own animals which i think is great for childrens imaginations   please note that some of these pieces are quite small  so as long as the child doesnt put things in their mouths this toy is perfect i think this toy is quite educational because there are loads of talking points that could be used whilst playing with this and so many different ways that you can use/play with this board  it arrived really quickly and well packaged as well

considering the price ¬£1399 with an 10% voucher at time of this amazon vine review i was expecting that this take apart dinosaur set would arrive in an attractive box or packaging suitable for gifting and it doesinside the cardboard box there are basic set of picture instructions also inside the box there are three colourful take apart dinosaurs in pieces in individual clear non-resealable bags and an electric drill  with two different drill heads batteries required not included and youll need a small tool to open and close the battery compartment each dinosaur pack also has a plastic manual screwdriver which can be used instead of the battery operated drillthe three dinosaurs are a t-rex velociraptor triceratops each colourful dinosaur is put together with the supplied screws which are tightened using the electric drill and one of the drill heads or the plastic screwdriver the idea is that you can put together the dinosaurs play with them and then take them apart to reassemble at a later datei think this is a reasonably good value set as i fairly recently bought a single take apart dinosaur for about ¬£3 no electric drill and these three dinosaurs look as if it is a similar size this is also a nice selection of sturdy looking plastic dinosaurs containing three popular ones and you could split up the set to up to three children i am pleased with this product and i am happy to recommend

seriously who thought up these things the lego dots annoy the life out of me basically because i always find them all over my floor the good thing is that unlike the bricks these arent some sort of medieval torture device if you stand on them my daughter is 7 and she loves all things lego including these shes not big on designing things herself but will happily follow the instructions to produce something resembling whats on the box

this is a wonderful set - the newer lego dot range appeals to the older girl who perhaps likes to decorate/create personalised items i guess the combination of the famous mouse alongside the lego name has inflated the price even higher  than usual however price aside the item itself is lots of fun and keeps her entertained for hours
my grandson and granddaughter are great disney fans so we had a lovely time playing with thisyou get everything you need to make several itemsgreat for disney and lego fans

this is a really great set comes with lots of different pieces to makes lots of different bits and bobs my daughter really likes it everything is good quality and the instructions are easy to follow pricy but worth it

lego - whats not to like  mickey mouse - whats not to likethis set gives you both  it comes with clear instructions for you to make 6 mickey and minnie themed lego items for your desk and tags for your school bagmy granddaughter loved it - she had a lot of fun making the items and they now take pride of place on the table in her bedroomi know its lego and lego is never cheap - but i do think its on the expensive side even for that brand which is why i have only given in 4 stars instead of 5

when you thought lego couldn‚Äôt get even more fabulous and versatile they created lego dotsthese kits are perfect for a young designer who wants to create different patterns or designs on a variety of practical pieces  this set comes with the base pieces to design a 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patchthey are supposedly mickey and minnie themed however i think this is a bit of a stretch as only a few pieces have a theme printed onto them or the pieces are made to look like mickey ears  nevertheless you get plenty of tiny pieces to design and create your pieces which was perfect for my 5 year old daughterlego is always that little bit more expensive but you are paying for good quality long-lasting toys  these can be designed over and over for years and years to come

this lego set was a big hit in our house my stepdaughter loved building it up and its now displayed proudly shes a huge fan of lego dots so the added sentiment of mickey was a huge hit it builds well and allows for creativity would love to see more

a great present for somebody who likes crafts creativity and legomaking something practical to keep a box a pencil holder and customising it what better fungreat family / friends activity add your own lego or dots to other setscute colours and disney pieces

we have lego mad kids in our house and they are just starting to get into the dots this is a lovely little set that contains 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patchlego tends to be top end in terms of price anyway but i felt this set was a little too far on the top end of that market possibly because its mickey mouse tooregardless kids loved it and its a very cute set and makes getting back to school fun now takes pride of place on the desk¬£35 at the time of review

perfect for any mickey fan this was in the same style as many of the dots set but with the mickey theme you can make five different things including bag tags photo frame small two drawer chest you get plenty of dots to do your designs with and of course they interact with any other colours you might have from other sets they are fun and easy to do and you can change them around and my daughter enjoys be able to use the items in her room overall good value and fun

this review is for lego set number 41964 the set features mickey and minnie mouse themed projects and it comes from the lego dots range it currently costs ¬£35  it is aimed at ages 6+ the pieces themselves are very small - dots in fact these dots are used to decorate the craft set which eatures a 2-drawer chest desk tidy picture frame note holder 2 bag tags and a sticker patch this is quite a strange lego concept which i have never come across before i guess that this would be a lovely gift for an artistic lego enthusiast it is designed so as to be able to change the design of the frame / bag tags / etc when the urge comes over the budding designer there are disney specific dots that are mickey and minnie themed they look a bit like emojis the frame template looks like mickey‚Äôs ears and can be decorated with the coloured dots due to the small dots this set is recommended for ages 6 plus

da qualche hanno lego ha introdotto nel suo catalogo la serie lego dots un gioco creativo rivolto ai pi√π piccoli che permette di creare alcuni oggetti come braccialetti portapenne cornici ed altro con la possibilit√† di personalizzarli a piacimentoogni confezione di lego dots comprende gli oggetti che servono come base e da elementi i dots realizzati in varie forme e colori e che si applicano a pressione sulle basi non esiste uno schema preciso per applicare i dots alla base quindi il gioco lascia molto spazio alla fantasia dei bambini che personalizzano l‚Äôoggetto sempre in maniera diversaquesto kit back to school di topolino e minnie si compone di 669 pezzi e contiene le basi per realizzare i seguenti oggetti- 1 scrigno con 2 cassetti con le orecchie di topolino- 1 cornice- 1 porta biglietti- 2 tag bag piatte- 1 patch adesivacome detto il set √® poi ricco di dots di forme e colori diversi e se non dovessero bastare √® sempre possibile acquistare gli extra dots lego per aumentare ancor di pi√π le tante combinazioni possibilinel momento in cui scrivo la recensione il costo √® di circa 40 euro grazie ad uno sconto del 10% ma secondo me resta ancora troppo alto per questo tipo di prodotto legoper questo motivo restando i prodotti lego dei giochi sempre graditi ed esclusivi non assegno il punteggio massimo e vi invito ad acquistarlo solo se i vostri bambini amano la serie dots
